name: Chaos Allure Queen
effectText: You can discard 1 other LIGHT or DARK monster; Special Summon this card from your hand. You can target 1 monster in either GY; equip it to this card as an Equip Spell, and if you do, this card's name becomes that equipped monster's name (until the End Phase), then if you equipped a LIGHT or DARK Monster Card by this effect, you can Special Summon 1 DARK "Allure Queen" monster from your Deck or GY. You can only use each effect of "Chaos Allure Queen" once per turn.
